Biography

Redshirt-Junior Year (2022)

Earned Academic All-MIVA honors

Recipient of the Br. David Delahanty Award-given to Lewis Student-athletes for academic excellence

Named Team Captain

Appeared in 28 matches

Season high of 132 total kills.

Season high of 101 digs

Season high of 22 service aces

Season high of 37 block assists

Redshirt-Sophomore Year (2021)

Earned Academic All-MIVA honors

Earned ADA Academic Achievement Award

Recipient of the Br. David Delahanty Award-given to Lewis Student-Athletes for academic excellence

2021 NCAA Final Four

2021 MIVA Conference Champions

2021 MIVA Regular Season Champions

Appeared in 24 matches and played in 77 sets.

Season high of 51 kills.

Season high of 11 assists.

Season high of 140 digs.

Season high of 8 total service aces.

Season high of 8 service aces

Season high of 22 block assists

Redshirt-Freshman Year (2020):

Appeared in four matches and played five sets.

Recorded career-highs in kills (4), attack attempts (8), assists (2), digs (1) and service aces (1) against Urbana (Jan 24, 2020).

Had a career-high with two block assists in the season opening sweep of King (Jan 3, 2020).

Recipient of the Br. David Delahanty Award - given to Lewis student-athletes for academic excellence.

Earned Academic All-MIVA honors.

Recipient of the D2 ADA Academic Achievement Award.

Freshman Year (2019):

Used this season as a redshirt campaign.

Recipient of the Br. David Delahanty award - given to Lewis student-athletes for academic excellence.

2019 NCAA Final Four

2019 MIVA Conference Champions

2019 MIVA Regular Season Champions

Earned Academic All-MIVA accolades.

High School:

Brillhart was a four-year letterwinner for Northeastern High School.

In 2017, he helped Northeastern win the Pennsylvania Interscholastic Athletic Association (PIAA) Class 2A State Championship as well as a mark of 20-2.

For his efforts, he was named to both the PIAA All-District 3 First Team and PIAA All-State First Team.

Personal:

Son of Kevin and Jennifer Brillhart

Majoring in finance.

SINGLE MATCH HIGH:

Kills: 11, vs. Quincy, Feb. 19, 2022

Attacks: 32, vs. Urbana, Feb. 5, 2022

Attack pct: .500, vs. Maryville, Jan. 11, 2022

Assists: 2, vs. Lindenwood, Feb. 18, 2022

Serve aces: 5, vs. Maryville, Jan. 11, 2022

Digs: 9, vs. Campbellsville, Jan. 20, 2021

Blocks: 4, vs. Lincoln Memorial, Jan. 23, 2021

Block assist: 4, vs. Lincoln Memorial, Jan. 23, 2021

No stats available for the current season.
